title.native: 私に天使が舞い降りた！
title.english: WATATEN!: an Angel Flew Down to Me

description:
The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: An Angel Swooped Down on Me!
นางฟ้าตัวน้อยได้ลงมาโปรดฉันค่ะ

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Cosplay
tags.description: Features dressing up as a different character or profession.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

title.native: 私に天使が舞い降りた！
私に天使が舞い降りた！OVA
私に天使が舞い降りた！プレシャス・フレンズ

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/志茂文彦) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fumihiko_Shimo)

Noted for writing the scripts for Kyoto Animation's anime adaptations of Key visual novels.

Began his career as a production assistant on [Grave of the Fireflies](https://anilist.co/anime/578/), but switched to writing right after.
Originating from [Nomad](https://anilist.co/studio/70/), where she initially worked as a production assistant.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/koshiaki09)

Formerly affiliated with [Doga Kobo](https://anilist.co/studio/95/), currently affiliated with [Studio Kafka](https://anilist.co/studio/6754/Studio-Kafka).

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/福田道生)

Originating from [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/). Debuted as a director on [Hyakko](https://anilist.co/anime/4550/).
Notable directorial works include [Kamichu!](https://anilist.co/anime/489/), [Welcome to the Space Show](https://anilist.co/anime/8115/) and [Magi](https://anilist.co/anime/14513/).
